edu.vt.middleware.password
Class UsernameRule

java.lang.Object
  edu.vt.middleware.password.UsernameRule
All Implemented Interfaces:
Rule
public class UsernameRule
extends java.lang.Object
implements Rule

UsernameRule contains methods for determining if a password contains the username associated with that password.

Version:
$Revision: 1724 $ $Date: 2010-10-29 13:47:59 -0400 (Fri, 29 Oct 2010) $
Author:
Middleware Services
